title: THDCIL to invest Rs 8,800 cr in pumped storage projs in Rajasthan: CMD Vishnoi
description: State-owned THDCIL has signed an MoU with the Rajasthan government to develop two 800 MW pumped storage projects in Bundi and Tonk, with a total investment of Rs 8,800 crore. These PSPs will utilize Gudha Dam and Bisalpur reservoir water, enhancing grid stability and sustainable energy solutions.
